channel.title: Money making methods
channel.description:
I recently just started playing RuneScape again. I quit in 2010 and a lot has changed, my old method doesn't work anymore, just looking for a few methods to earn some cash.
[img]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/7541/120930231543.png[/img]
Those are my current stats. Any suggestions?

item.title: Money making methods
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Tutorial:

The economy is so inflated right now, so there aren’t too many decent ways to make cash that are quick and efficient. People either stake, buy gold, or bot for money now.

I don’t like staking, and how would the other 2 be a legit way to make money? I don’t buy gold, and I have never botted.

Read full topic

item.title: Money making methods
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Could duo corp with the many people here. Or do any GWD boss. Could get your dungeoneering level up a bit and do frosts too.

Read full topic

item.title: Money making methods
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:5, topic:462726”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=565933.msg4116641#msg4116641 date=1349127427]
With stats like that, PvM is the obvious choice. Definitely try out Armadyl Godwars. Wear full Armadyl, rune crossbow, diamond bolts, zamorak prayer book, etc and bring a unicorn. You should be able to last a fairly long time soloing. Chaos elemental is also fairly nice in terms of difficulty and drops.
[/quote]

I have done both in the past, I’ve never got anything good I have been thinking of giving it a try again though.[/quote]

The trick is to not care what drops or what you get. Drink some wine, relax, and read a book while you Boss. I’ve gotten so many Barrows pieces from doing this. At one point the chest couldn’t stop giving me Equipment.

In other words, if you’re expecting a Berserker Ring drop at Dag kings, you might get 1 if you’re lucky.

If you don’t care what you get, and instead focus on gaining experience or something similar, then you’re probably going to get 6 per trip.

ALSO: With your Stats you can stay for a long time.

Read full topic

item.title: Money making methods
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

rip4d:

With stats like that, PvM is the obvious choice. Definitely try out Armadyl Godwars. Wear full Armadyl, rune crossbow, diamond bolts, zamorak prayer book, etc and bring a unicorn. You should be able to last a fairly long time soloing. Chaos elemental is also fairly nice in terms of difficulty and drops.

I have done both in the past, I’ve never got anything good I have been thinking of giving it a try again though.

item.title: Money making methods
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:462726”]With an account such as that, I’d go to Dag Kings. I’m not sure if It’s still as effective as it used to be, but It’s good for seeing a semi-rare drop within a short timespan. I’d go as a Solo Mage without a team. Also, once you get the hang of it, It’s pretty easy to just multi-task while you Solo Mage Rex. You don’t have to have cash to invest in Equipment either, I’ve ragged Dag Kings plenty of times.

There’s a ton of ways you can earn cash whilst leveling your stats further. You could train Defence with Slayer and buy 99 Prayer with what you earn from Slayer.

You could do any of the G.W.D. Bosses.

You almost have all of your Stats above 70. If you set a goal for yourself to get them all above level 70, then you will surely have thought of a way to make money in that time.[/quote]

I’ve never done DK’s before, I had friends that did it back in the day, and I never went with them. Training defense with Slayer is a probability. I may do that, I do want to get my account maxed. Thanks for the idea’s

Read full topic

item.title: Money making methods
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

With an account such as that, I’d go to Dag Kings. I’m not sure if It’s still as effective as it used to be, but It’s good for seeing a semi-rare drop within a short timespan. I’d go as a Solo Mage without a team. Also, once you get the hang of it, It’s pretty easy to just multi-task while you Solo Mage Rex. You don’t have to have cash to invest in Equipment either, I’ve ragged Dag Kings plenty of times.

There’s a ton of ways you can earn cash whilst leveling your stats further. You could train Defence with Slayer and buy 99 Prayer with what you earn from Slayer.

You could do any of the G.W.D. Bosses.

You almost have all of your Stats above 70. If you set a goal for yourself to get them all above level 70, then you will surely have thought of a way to make money in that time.

Read full topic
